sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {listSubscriptionsDetails} from '../actions/subActions' const SubscriptionPlan = ({ match }) => { const dispatch =useDispatch() const subDetails = useSelector(state => state.subDetails) const {error,loading,subscription} = subDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listSubscriptionsDetails(match.params.id)) }, []) return (
Go Back

{subscription.name}

{subscription.duration} days

 Price: Rs. {subscription.price} Description: {subscription.description} Features: {subscription.features} Price: Rs.{subscription.price}
) } export default SubscriptionPlan
